text:
Ideally we would want to be able to search all cms content blogs and pages.
in the same way the content search api works
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/site-search>
Hey Tony, apologies again for the issues you were seeing. We believe we've resolved this, but feel free to ping me if you continue to have issues!
Thanks, JP! I did noticed the issue resolved itself yesterday. Can you shed any more light on what the issues was? Iâ€™d like to relay some extra information to our client if possible.

Surely! And of course, I'm really sorry for the inconvenience.

The issue was due to a new built-in property on HubDB rows we rolled out called `publishedAt` , which tracks when a given row was published. There was a delay between when we rolled the change out, and when our renderer was able to use it. When our renderer tried to parse the new column, exceptions were thrown internally and caused HubDB related content to fail the rendering process.

All that to say, it was a brief outage between HubDB and the CMS itself, nothing specific to you client's hub. We've implemented changes today that will ensure something like this doesn't happen moving forward!
